title: Start with the Basics
text: Begin by understanding the core message you want to communicate through the data.

title: Focus on the Key Message
text: Identify the main insight or takeaway that the data should highlight.

title: Avoid Overloading with Data
text: Do not start by presenting all data chronologically; focus on the most relevant information.

title: Logical Flow in Storytelling
text: Ensure the data story has a logical flow by centering it around a clear message.

hintAnswer: Identify the key message or insight you want to convey.
title: Identify the Key Message
text: The first step is to identify the key message or insight you want to convey.
choices: Start with the conclusion and work backwards.
Identify the key message or insight you want to convey.
Gather all data and present it in chronological order.
Focus on the most complex data points first.
